parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not definitive proof that the post is not electoral propaganda, it is a factor to consider.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Alternativa pentru Demnitate Nationala" (ADN), a political party participating in the parliamentary elections. This directly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  This indicates an intention to reach a wide audience, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's text, "Anunt important," coupled with the mention of ADN, strongly suggests an electoral objective. The "important announcement" likely aims to influence voters' opinions and potentially increase votes for ADN. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It does not provide news, analysis, or opinions on political events. Instead, it appears to be a direct promotional message for ADN.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear advertisement for a political party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>920139606746512</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific parliamentary candidate (ADN), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has a clear electoral objective (to promote ADN).  The lack of journalistic content further strengthens this conclusion.  The timing of the post is crucial; while the exact date isn't specified, the provided `end_date` suggests it might fall outside the official campaign period, potentially violating Article 98 t).  However, without knowing the exact posting date, we cannot definitively confirm this.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Alternativa pentru Demnitate Nationala</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FRP TV</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Federatia Romanilor de Pretutindeni, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 920139606746512, care promovează direct Alternativa pentru Demnitate Națională, având ca efect electoral creşterea numărului de voturi pentru acest partid.  Postarea, cu textul "Alternativa Pentru Demnitate Nationala Anunt important", constituie material de propagandă electorală conform art. 36 (7) din Legea nr. 334/2006, întrucât se referă direct la un candidat (ADN), este utilizată într-o perioadă ce pare a fi post-campanie electorală, are un obiectiv electoral clar (promovarea ADN) și se adresează publicului larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook.  Lipsa oricărui element jurnalistic confirmă caracterul propagandistic al postării.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
